description:
net/textproto: add "Cookie" to the common headers list

Seems to have been omitted before.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM. There was a Set-Cookie, but no Cookie.

On Wed, Mar 27, 2013 at 5:04 PM,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> net/textproto: add "Cookie" to the common headers list
>
> Seems to have been omitted before.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.com/7749049/
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/pkg/net/textproto/reader.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/net/textproto/reader.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/net/textproto/reader.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/net/textproto/reader.go
> @@ -574,6 +574,7 @@
>         "Content-Length",
>         "Content-Transfer-Encoding",
>         "Content-Type",
> +       "Cookie",
>         "Date",
>         "Dkim-Signature",
>         "Etag",
>
>
> --
>

> "golang-dev" group.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2eb36d0ca449 ***

net/textproto: add "Cookie" to the common headers list

Seems to have been omitted before.

CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 7749049: net/textproto: add "Cookie" to the common headers list
